Hopefully this clears up some confusion:

This is not a proper rip, because it does not contain wave 4. If you play it on xbox live without fixing it, you will probably get banned. In order to fix it, just download abgx360 1.0.2 and the wave 4 data. Then just autofix it. 

The game is english.

Modern Warfare 2 is a region free game, so you you don't have to worry about where u bought your 360.

Recommend you use iXtreme 1.61 FW, as this has been fixed to properly recognize wave 4 data.
